    Modifier and Type Method Description
    recipe.com.example.food.entity.recipes createRecipe​(recipe.com.example.food.entity.recipes recipe)
    This method takes entity body recipe , method checks weather input body already in database or not, if recipe is not present in database it will add the given recipe body and returns the same, if recipe already exists exception thrown
    recipe.com.example.food.entity.recipes deleteRecipe​(java.lang.Integer recipeId)
    This method takes recipe id as an input , checks weather recipe is present or not, if recipe is present in database ,recipe gets deleted if recipe is not present exception is thrown
    recipe.com.example.food.entity.recipes getRecipe​(java.lang.String recipeName)
    this method takes recipe-name as input.
    recipe.com.example.food.entity.recipes updateRecipe​(java.lang.Integer recipeId, recipe.com.example.food.entity.recipes recipe)
    This method takes recipe id ,and updated recipe entity, checks weather recipe is present in database or not.
